Product.name: Iphone 7
Product.description: Apple iPhone 7 is the upcoming mobile from Apple that is expected to be launched in India on July 13, 2020 (Unofficial). The mobile will come with adequate specifications and decent specifications. It is rumored to be available at a starting price of Rs 75,990.
